about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
While sitting underneath a Japanese maple, on a bench just for you, look around in awe at the surroundings as you begin your experience towards wonder. Next find yourself in a tree fort by a calm creek, sit and admire the forest before transitioning to the base of a breathtaking waterfall in the summer.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self meditation

Length
10:08

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
